dict.acceptation: 运动；活动；动作，举动；乐章；

sent.orig: According to Aristotle, movement in nature is classified into two kinds: natural movement and forced movement.
sent.trans: 亚里士多德先生说：自然界的运动有两种，一种是天然运动，一种是被迫运动。

sent.orig: Other types of movement General questions in English may also involve syntactic movement with AUX-movement.
sent.trans: 英语中一般疑问句也可以引起句法移位，这种移位称为助动词移位，也就是将助动词移至句首位置。

sent.orig: Trunk movement variability can increase the rate of body movement, improve body movement of the expression.
sent.trans: 躯干动作的多变性可加大身体运动的幅度，提高身体动作的表现力。

sent.orig: Meanwhile fluid trap, which mainly formed in Yanshan Movement and Himalayan Movement, is not dominant. 4.
sent.trans: 流体圈闭是燕山和喜山运动的产物，在研究区不占主要地位。

sent.orig: Movement of plants and animals over the earth's surface has been greatly affected land movement.
sent.trans: 地壳的运动对生活在地球表面的植物和动物也有着巨大的影响。
